title: Data from a trial of usrodeoxycholic acid
description:
Description
Data from a trial of ursodeoxycholic acid (UDCA) in patients with primary
biliary cirrohosis (PBC).
reference:
This data set is used in the Therneau and Grambsh.  The udca1
data set contains the baseline variables along with the time until the
first endpoint (any of death, transplant, ..., worsening).
The udca2 data set treats all of the endpoints as parallel
events and has a stratum for each.

parameters.riskscore: the Mayo PBC risk score at entry
parameters.entry.dt: date of entry into the study
parameters.worsen.dt: worsening of symptoms by two stages

format: A data frame with 170 observations on the following 15 variables.
